content: {"name": "Philadelphia County Assistance Office - Boulevard District- SNAP Assistance", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Families need to complete the 2024-25 school meal & summer EBT application to receive summer benefits ($120 per eligible child)- name spelling, address, etc. all need to be up to date and accurate! Summer EBT Outreach Toolkit\" https://www.pa.gov/content/dam/copapwp-pagov/en/dhs/documents/services/assistance/documents/snap/PA-1990-SunBucks-Application.pdf\nOnline: Apply for or renew your SNAP benefits online by using https://www.compass.state.pa.us/compass.web/Public/CMPHome. \nIn-person: File an application at your county assistance office. You can download an application right here,https://www.dhs.pa.gov/Services/Assistance/Pages/Apply-for-Benefits.aspx ,, fill it out, and return it to your county assistance office:", "email": "", "url": "https://www.dhs.pa.gov/Services/Assistance/Pages/SNAP.aspx", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "4109 Frankford Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Frankford", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19124", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.0076001, "longitude": -75.0905236}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 560-6500", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration on website required"}]}
